content:
In Flang, the phrase "The dog's house" would be translated as "Flomi fashi".

To break it down:
- "flomi" is the inflected form of the word "flom" (dog) in the genitive case
- "fashi" is the inflected form of the word "fash" (house) in the genitive case

So, when we put it all together, we get "Flomi fashi" which means "The dog's house" in Flang. I hope this helps, and let me know if you have any other questions or requests.
